FuncDef: This command determines the inner VIDs (for a specified outer VID) associated with the virtual Ethernet segment on a specific qinq port or LAG based on the following:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the outer VID for the c-tag range. Values-*, 0 to 4094.

Specifies the inner VID for the c-tag range. When configuring a range of qtags (and not a single value), the second qtag1 value must be greater than the value of the first qtag1. Values-*, null, 0 to 4094.
